channel.title: Cant get onto any servers
channel.description: I recently started college and have my laptop, i downloaded the moparscape client at home and it was playing fine then.Tthe client loads all the way to the login screen but doesn't login to the server. I am thinking the college has blocked the downloading of the servers, is there anyway i could get onto the servers by downloading something?

well i was just takin a guess haha …im gonna go cry myself 2 sleep now

item.title: Cant get onto any servers
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

The reason is that the “College” has allowed your wireless browsing however they have limited it back to just that. Nothing you can do about it unles you change the configeration settings within the “College”.

You should have listened to spid3rm4n when he told you the first time it was the “College” lol ;).

Spid3rm4n the champion who owns all!

Chewie your way off; if your using a router & you set it up you will know about the configeration settings that you can play with

Read full topic
